entry.title: New Homepage Layout
entry.content: We’ve updated the site design for the root of solenopsis.org and will be updating the other pages under this header soon.

entry.title: Introducing SLoggly
entry.content: Recently we have released another tool in the Solenopsis “suite” of Salesforce tools. This tool is designed to be able to push messages from APEX in Salesforce to Loggly. It supports single logs and batch logging. Head over to our github page to read about it and download it for yourself. We will be working on getting this built and deployed on the AppExchange shortly.

entry.title: Solenopsis blog
entry.content: In an effort to up transparency we’re going to try to blog new features and future plans.
